page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT
page.content:
There are no large factories in our area, we therefore decided to find out what jobs were available in the village. Our survey revealed that only 14% of those able to work worked in the village. These are :- {School 4 employees {Fish & Chip Shop 1 enployee {Farming 1 employee {Home Help 1 employee {Dress Making 1 employee {Leaton Industrial Estate 1 employee {} Most people work in Shrewsbury
Over 70% of those who were employed worked outside our area. The great majority work in service industries e.g. C.R.S. Telecom Health Authority. Only 2 worked in manufacturing industry - Perkins Diesel, Harlescott.
